sentence: I was helping to plan the breakfast and had to interact with the staff who were responsible for setting up the banquet room the night before the breakfast and on the day of the breakfast
I was here for a conference and originally booked a room for two nights
There is an elevator somewhere by the conference rooms but I have never seen it
Could NOT handle NUVO dance convention 22015
I can not believe that a hotel and conference center such as this one is unable to offer free internet in the room especially since so many of the slightly cheaper venues already include it

Parking was complicated hotel is attached to conference center with no clear signage to check in desk hotel parking room smelled stale hair in the toliet TV and hairdryer did not work bed was not terrible but gave both my husband and I a backache
Staff greeted me at the door and showed me to my meeting
While bellman service in the hotel was fine getting bellman service in the conference center was horrible
Stayed 2 nights at hotel for a dance convention
Would recommend it to anyone looking for a location for their functions
I was there for NIH meetings at the Neuroscience Center
Went to small press expo
Clean but pricey during conference
The staff at Starbucks and at our conference were excellent but this was the worst hotel experience I have had
If you are going to park for an event I recommend parking at the metro stop down the road
A tranquil area even though the event I went to was kinda crazy
For a conference experience their parking is horribly expensive and they make you pay for wifi
The parking was a bit confusing though as the garage for the conference centre is actually around the corner from the main entrance
The conference center was fairly typical of hotel conference centers albiet a little dimly lit in some places

The email we got said right into it to hand it to the desk when checking in and they told us it was not valid and we had to get the conference chair to take time out of his busy schedule of running the week long conference to tell the desk this was right
The conference floor is falling apart a bit in the main stage room
The restaurant was too small to handle our large convention
No one was at the front table and reparing job was going inside the building at daytime while various meetings were taking place in the hotel

Brock was also a pleasure to deal with and even offered to put my name at the front desk to let them know in case I came back later in the week for more meetings that I could park in the overnight parking lot
